name: Transylmania II: The Vampire Bites Back!
storyline:
Pesky village people, hell bend on destroying Vampy, have once again stormed his castle!
Sheez! Sometimes it sucks to be a Vampire!

But this time they're more heavily armed and accompanied by a mysterious presence... the Evil Dr. Faustoner!
Not finding Vampy in his coffin, Dr. Faustoner instead steals Vampy's little green Deadly Bear, in an effort to lure Vampy to him!

Help Vampy travel across land & sea, gathering clues along the way, to find Faustoner & reclaim Vampy's Deadly Bear... before something EVIL happens him!
summary:
Pesky village people are back again and hell bent on destroying Vampy inside his castle!
Sheez! Sometimes it sucks to be a Vampire!
